front.title: The Logical Structure of a P2PSIP Overlay Node

abstract.t: This document describes the logical structure of a P2PSIP overlay peer and client. The document is not normative in nature, it is intended mainly as a clarification for the application developers. Editors note: Possible outcomes of this draft are 1) Informational RFC, 2) Incorporated to Concepts and Terminology draft, or 3) Seen as redundant and discarded altogether.
